name: Fee
text:
PART II.  AUCTION

Note
  Sections 445-21 to 38 designated as Part II by L 1990, c 164, §28.
  Assessment under §26H-4 removed.  L 1992, c 232, §1.
     The annual fee for a license to sell goods, wares, merchandise, or other property at auction, shall be $100 for each taxation district. [L 1896, c 64, §25; RL 1925, §1973; am L Sp 1932 2d, c 66, §1; RL 1935, §2417; RL 1945, §7018; RL 1955, §155-18; HRS ; am L 1990, c 164, §12]
Case Notes
  Public auction defined.  19 H. 651.  Discrimination in amount not unconstitutional.  19 H. 651, aff'd 226 U.S. 184.
  "Thirty day money-back guarantee" did not prevent sale from constituting an auction.  51 H. 502, 463 P.2d 914.
